testcase.name: CRM application login with valid username and valid password
testcase.system-out: Given user opens browser....................................................passed Then user is on login page..................................................passed When user enters valid username and valid password and clicks on Login button.passed Then homepage gets displayed................................................passed And verify username.........................................................passed And verify homepage tab displayed...........................................passed
